abstract: David Letterman hosted his 6,028th and final late-night show on May 20th. Do you watch late-night TV? Who are your favorite hosts, past or present? How has David Letterman shaped late-night television today? Where do you think the genre will go in the future?

headline.main: Throwback Thursday | Thirty-Three Years With David Letterman
